title: Lotus
description: Sit with your legs stretched in front of you. Bend your right leg and place your ankle on top of your left thigh. Bend your left leg and stack your ankle on top of your right thigh. Lengthen your spine. Rest the backs of your hands on your knees with your thumbs and index fingers touching. Relax your shoulders. Close your eyes. Hold the pose and take slow, deep breaths. Carefully release the legs. Face soles of feet upward Heels close to pubic bone Modification: Perform half lotus, bringing one ankle onto the thigh and the other just in front of the opposite shin. Avoid this pose if you have sciatica or knee issues.
alignment_cues: Maintain steady breath throughout the pose
Keep proper alignment based on pose type
Listen to your body and modify as needed
